name: 诺亚·泰勒 Noah Taylor
movies: 查理和巧克力工厂 Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
古墓丽影 Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
古墓丽影2 Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
intro: Noah George Taylor is a British-Australian actor. He is best known for his roles as teenage David Helfgott in Shine, Locke in HBO series Game of Thrones, Darby Sabini in the BBC One series Peaky Blinders, Mr. Bucket in Charlie and the Chocolate Factory and Danny in the Australian cult film He Died with a Felafel in His Hand. Taylor also starred as Adolf Hitler in Max and Preacher.
